nodes.html: The journal presents a platform for Russian and foreign scientists, reflects not only linguistic, but also cultural, historical, social aspects of learning and teaching Russian.

nodes.html: The aim of the journal is to create  scientific, research, educational and information space for presenting the achievements of Russian and foreign scientists in Russian language studies and methods of teaching Russian as a foreign language.

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 13.79
Element has sufficient color contrast of 13.79

nodes.html: The targets of the journal are:

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 13.79
Element has sufficient color contrast of 13.79

nodes.html: • Delivering the achievements of Russian and foreign scientists in Russian language studies, publishing the results of scientific centres in developing and keeping the Russian language in the multipolar world;

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 13.79

nodes.html: • Characterizing theoretical papers on Russian language functioning in Russia and abroad;

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 13.79

nodes.html: • Pointing out the problems in methods of teaching Russian as a foreign, non-native, and native language;

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 13.79

nodes.html: • Analyzing modern trends in Russian language teaching at school and university;

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 13.79

nodes.html: • Reflecting problems of learning and teaching Russian as a foreign language and keeping the Russian language in diasporas;

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 13.79

nodes.html: • Problems of developing Russian as a language of science;

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 13.79

nodes.html: • Presenting Russian national policy in the Russian language and methods of its teaching;

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 13.79

nodes.html: • Demonstrating media-didactic and electronic means of teaching Russian.

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 13.79

nodes.html: Next issues of the journal are planned as thematic ones and are devoted to the most actual problems of Russian language studies. Thematic issues are announced at the journal site.

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 13.79

nodes.html: The journal publishes scientific articles (theoretical, academic and research, methodical), review articles, book reviews, annotations, scientific reports about Russian and foreign scientists.

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 13.79

nodes.html: The journal publishes only original articles that have not been published before. Self-plagiarism is not allowed.

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 13.79

nodes.html: The journal has an international status proved by the editorial board and reviewers including outstanding scientists from Russia, the United States, Belarus, Spain, Italy, Latvia, Finland, Germany, Great Britain.

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 13.79

nodes.html: The journal is published every three months with 4 issues a year.

nodes.html: The aim of the journal is to create  scientific, research, educational and information space for presenting the achievements of Russian and foreign scientists in Russian language studies and methods of teaching Russian as a foreign language.
